metadata.synopsis: A VCR- and calculator-manual writer's ordinary life is turned upside down when his house is stolen.

reviews: Sweet sassy molassy, Moving is one of the funniest films I've seen in a long time.
Probably isn't going to be the next Blair Witch of indie-ville.
One of the funniest independent films of the year.
Overall, high caliber for an indie of this nature.
The saving grace of this no-budget movie is that the comedy works well.
If I had a nickel for every wacky-road-trip indie flick I've had to review, well, I'm not sure how much I'd have, but I know it would be pretty close to a dollar.
